statements: DELETE FROM delivery_vehicles WHERE delivery_vehicle_id = 101 AND vehicle_name = 'Truck';
DELETE FROM delivery_vehicles WHERE current_location = POINT(12.345, 67.890) AND last_update < TIMESTAMP '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE status = 'In Transit';
DELETE FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND status = 'Delivered';
DELETE FROM delivery_vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'Truck' AND current_location = 'Warehouse A';
DELETE FROM route_points WHERE route_id = 2001 AND point_sequence = 3;
DELETE FROM vehicle_routes WHERE route_id = 201 AND vehicle_id = 101;
